data.name: Flickr - No Pro No Problem
TruckersMP Forum Dark Style v2
data.description:
Changes TruckersMP Forum to have better colours, slight material design features and more modern. Make sure to set TruckersMP dark theme on forum first!

Based on Digital's TruckersMP Dark Beta.
Made by ~ SgtBreadStick.

data.name: YouTube - seek preview and time not overlapping
data.description: A small tweak to the "seek preview" that shows up when you pass the mouse pointer over the seek bar. The time text will not be overlapping the preview thumbnail anymore.

data.name: TinyEye Search - WideScreen Results v.5
data.description: It's for A LARGE SCREEN (WideScreen 1920x1080!) # TOTAL REWORK 2020.02 # Less scrolling with this compact Userstyles for Images search results provided by this Firefox Addon: TinEye Reverse Image Search

user.name: decembre
user.about: I build Userstyles principally for : - Firefox. - WideScreen (1920x1080) adaptation (More things in the window, less scrolling) - Dark Gray style (better for night surfing) - Site Navigation (Tweaks its Interface by moving many things) Some preferences: - Flickr' Userstyles by decembre> - Userstyles : Userstyles TableView+Enhancer - Dark-Grey - Mozilla : Mozilla Addon Widescreen - Yahoo : Yahoo New Mail - Simply Dark And Gray - Télévision: Télérama WideScreen - New design - Search: DuckDuckGo - Multi-Columns Google - GM - Google MonkeyR Companion I use some useful things like... Addon / extensions: Userscripts : ★ MY ★ Installed ★ GM ★ Surf (USO Mirror) FireFox Addons : DECEMBRE Favorite Add-ons I try to adapt/create some Greasemonkey script: decembre (USO Mirror) in GreasyFork by example: UserScripts WideScreen Dark/Grey(USO Mirror) Userstyles TableView+Enhancer - Dark-Grey 59.1 (addStylish lib) - leoncastro ( GreasyFork) I publish my tweaks here: Decembre's Pastebin I spend a lot of time on Userstyles but too: - Flickr and my pools in it: > Portrait★Faces > Portrait★Faces★Open Minded

data.name: Ebay Kleinanzeigen Dark
data.description:
Unflexible Version für userstyles.org. Die richtige (und immer aktuelle) Version mit Optionen gibt es als UserCSS für Stylus: https://github.com/stonecrusher/stylus-UserCSS/tree/master/ebay-kleinanzeigen
Direkt mit STYLUS installieren!

data.name: GMX FreeMail ausgeputzt
data.description:
Login-, Logout-, Vorschalt- und Errorseite sowie Posteingang für gmx.net / .de / .at / .ch radikal geputzt und sämtliche (Eigen)werbung entfernt.
Optionaler "dark style" und Einblenden bestimmter Features (siehe Advanced style settings).
*** Not working for gmx.fr / CaraMail / gmx.com *** Angelehnt an Version 2.3.6
